page.title: 01TEMPLETON DOMESDAY BLOCK.
page.content: Our D-Block includes the village of Templeton, (Welsh name being Tredemel) to the East.The old airfield is in the centre of the block.The Molleston area lies to the North and Mounton area to the North West of the airfield.It is a cattle and sheep farming area.The main crop is grass for hay and silage.There are four farms on the main street of Templeton Village.Their names are Templeton Farm,Rising Sun Farm,Poyer's Farm and Martin's Farm.The village of Templeton is situated 2 miles from Narberth,13 miles from Haverfordwest,7 miles from Tenby and 22 miles from Carmarthen.In the whole of our D-Block there are 524 people.138 of them are children,283 are men and women of working age and the other 103 are retired.
